summary.Title: A production employee is wanted for a large metal company in Juelsminde

summary.Presentation:
A production employee is wanted for a large metal company in Juelsminde
 
For a good partner in Juelsminde, BECH Personale is looking for a production employ

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: A production employee is wanted for a large metal company in Juelsminde
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
A production employee is wanted for a large metal company in Juelsminde

 

For a good partner in Juelsminde, BECH Personale is looking for a production employee for a Try and Hire course. Whether you are skilled or unskilled does not matter, you just need to have experience with black iron. You will be trained in robot welding if you do not already have experience. You will be offered an attractive salary package and you will come to salary negotiations by permanent employment. Working hours on evening shifts Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday 14.00 - 24.00 and Thursday 12.00 - 18.00.

 

If you do not have the Section 26 course (Environment course) you will at some point be called by the company to a one day course.

 

We offer• Work at an absolutely fantastic company with good colleagues• Around DKK 157 per hour (start-up salary) plus time supplement• Permanent work - evening shift - 4 days a week We expect• Meeting stable• Looking for permanent employment• Can work independently and in teams• Meetings at work in a high mood• Danish or English in writing and speaking

 

If you could see yourself becoming part of a good workplace, you are very welcome to send us your application by email - bpe@bechpersonale.dk or on our website www.bechpersonale.dk. Should you have any questions about the job, you are very welcome to call us on 22 60 65 90. We look forward to hearing from you.
